dct_description_sm: Collection of 1:20,000 black-and-white aerial photographs captured in 1951-1952 of the state of Massachusetts. This is also a test for clickable URLs in the description field: https://www.arcgis.com/apps/mapviewer/index.html?webmap=50545e378c7d407b883d730dd9de2c89.
gbl_displayNote_sm: Info: This collection is currently in the process of being georeferenced and made available on UMAP GeoData. For now, you can use this searchable web map to locate individual photos: https://www.arcgis.com/apps/mapviewer/index.html?webmap=50545e378c7d407b883d730dd9de2c89.
dct_publisher_sm: University of Massachusetts at Amherst. Department of Forestry and Wildlife Management
dct_rights_sm: Requests to publish, redistribute, or replicate this material should be addressed to Special Collections and University Archives, University of Massachusetts Amherst Libraries. For more information, see http://scua.library.umass.edu/services-at-scua/permissions/.
dct_rightsHolder_sm: Special Collections and University Archives, University of Massachusetts Amherst Libraries
